content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_wool
inventory=[{"type": "peony", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral", "quantity": 49, "index": 24}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 28}, {"type": "witch_spawn_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft pink_wool, I need to first craft pink_dye. To craft pink_dye, I can use the peony at slot 15, and therefore I will move it to the crafting grid (eg., slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_wool
inventory=[{"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "peony", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral", "quantity": 49, "index": 24}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 28}, {"type": "witch_spawn_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the pink_dye, I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., slot 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_wool
inventory=[{"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral", "quantity": 49, "index": 24}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 28}, {"type": "witch_spawn_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 39}]

thought: Now that I have crafted the pink_dye, I can craft the pink_wool. To craft pink_wool, I need to place the pink_dye and the white_wool side by side in the crafting grid, and therefore I will move the pink_dye to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_wool
inventory=[{"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral", "quantity": 49, "index": 24}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 28}, {"type": "witch_spawn_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have moved the pink_dye to the crafting grid, I can move the white_wool to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the white_wool to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_wool
inventory=[{"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral", "quantity": 49, "index": 24}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 28}, {"type": "witch_spawn_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the pink_wool, I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., slot 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
